usefulItems: bowl, plastic wrap, serving bowls, refrigerator
title: Spiced oranges and dates with yoghurt cream

ingredients.content: ½ vanilla bean, split into halves lengthways, seeds scraped
30 g shelled unsalted pistachio nuts (see Tip)
1 sprig fresh mint, leaves only, cut into pieces

preparations.content: <b>Insert butterfly whisk.<b> Place cream, yoghurt, cream cheese, honey and vanilla seeds into mixing bowl and mix <b>20 sec/speed 4<b>, until well combined. <b>Remove butterfly whisk.<b> Transfer into a bowl, cover with plastic wrap and place into refrigerator for 10 minutes. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place pistachios into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 7<b>, until roughly chopped. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place dates into mixing bowl and chop <b>6 sec/speed 8<b>, until roughly chopped.

Add orange juice and combine <b>10 sec//speed 2<b>. Divide date mixture between serving bowls. Divide orange segments between serving bowls, then top with yoghurt cream and garnish with chopped pistachios, mint leaves and cinnamon (optional).

hintsAndTricks: You can use soaked, then dehydrated nuts in this recipe.
